title: Coin Summary - Fictionio
withdraw-discliamer: * You can withdraw coins which are income only.
refund-bullet1: We stand behind our products and your satisfaction with them is important to us. However, because our products are digital goods delivered via Internet download we generally offer no refunds.
refund-bullet2: Refund requests made are handled on a case by case basis and are issued at our sole discretion. Refund requests, if any, must be made within thirty (30) days of your original purchase.
no-purchase-chapter: Do not have any purchased chapter.
purchase-chapter-load-fail: Problem has occured while loading, please try again.
paypal-remark: We will transfer to your e-mail address.
bank-withdraw-remark: We will transfer to your citizen id promptpay number.
withdraw-bullet1: You can withdraw from income only.
withdraw-bullet2: If transaction is success, money will transfer to your account within 3 working days.
withdraw-success: We received your request. If transaction is success, money will transfer to your account within 3 working days.
no-withdraw-history: Do not have any withdraw history.
withdraw-history-load-fail: Problem has occured while loading, please try again.
